{{for|the Accessory in {{XC2|-}}|Tyrant Ring (XC2)}}
|-|Common = {{Infobox item |name = Tyrant Ring |image = XC3 Accessory Ring.png |caption = Extends Launch duration by 25%. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Common |source = |sell = 22,450 [[Gold|G]] }} |-|Rare = {{Infobox item |name = Tyrant Ring |image = XC3 Accessory Ring.png |caption = Extends Launch duration by 26%. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Rare |source = |sell = 22,450 [[Gold|G]] }} |-|Legendary = {{Infobox item |name = Tyrant Ring |image = XC3 Accessory Ring.png |caption = Extends Launch duration by 27%. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Legendary |source = |sell = 22,450 [[Gold|G]] }}
'''Tyrant Rings''' are [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessories]] in {{XC3}} and {{XC3FR|sublink}}. {{clr}} {{xc3 stub}} {{fr stub}} [[Category:XC3 Accessories]] [[Category:XC3FR Accessories]]

{{Infobox Gem | name = Ultimate Counter | image = Gem-defender.png | effect = [Passive] Deals ''(value)%'' of Attack damage when you take damage. | category = Defender | max = 280% }} '''Ultimate Counter''' is a Defender [[Gem]] in {{XC3}} and {{XC3FR|sublink}}. == Gem Stats == {| class="xc1 gem-stats centered" style="width: 200px" ! !Attack Damage |- !I |80% |- !II |100% |- !III |120% |- !IV |140% |- !V |160% |- !VI |180% |- !VII |200% |- !VIII |220% |- !IX |240% |- !X |280% |} == List of Recipes== At [[Rest Spot (XC3)|Rest Spots]], [[Riku]] will [[Gem Crafting|craft]] [[Gem]]s using items picked up during adventures or acquired from [[enemy (XC3)|enemies]]. If the required items are missing, the party can instead exchange [[Nopon Coin (Gold)|Gold Nopon Coins]] to craft the gem without having to consume any of the required items. === {{XC3|-}} === {| class="xc1 sortable centered" width=100% !Name!!Ingredients!!Rarity!!Coin Cost |- |Ultimate Counter I |[[Gemstone]]

revision.comment: removing linking since we do not create pages for enemies' arts, every info should appear in this table and "stats" section
